modName: Tame The Beasts of Skyrim Addon - Predators
summary:
Features:
2 new Wolf types
White Tigers ( rare )
Leopards & leopard cubs
ALL SCATTERED ACROSS THE WORLD
descriptionHtml:
Tame The Beasts of Skyrim Addon - Predators
By: TheSkoomaKing & Hfiani
Requires:
[color=red]Dawnguard[/color]
[color=green]Tame The beasts of Skyrim[/color]
Newest Version of Skyrim

as stated by the name this is an addon for [color=yellow]Tame The Beasts of Skyrim[/color] found here on the nexus:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28944/] Tame The Beasts of Skyrim [/url]



Description:

This mod adds new predators to Skyrim. 

- White Tigers ( rare to find )

- Black Wolves

- Husky Wolves

- Leopard


There is also an optional file which replaces the original wolves with the new wolves. 
Ice wolves become Husky Wolves. And regular wolves become black wolves.


Credits:

AlienSlofs - For his Sabrecat textures which I retextured, thanks!

Bethesda for their wonderful game and creation kit!

Me and HFiani who created Tame The Beasts of Skyrim!
author: TheSkoomaKing and Hfiani
